name: 哥布林信条：起源 Goblin Creed: Origins
name_original: 哥布林信条：起源 Goblin Creed: Origins
description:
Goblin Creed: Origins is a fantasy RPG with combat and adventure.

· Challenging levels
Break into the woods, climb mountains, cross rivers, and avoid chaotic casks of wine
Four different scenarios require you to use your brain and perform delicate maneuvers!

· The watchman of silence but conviction
Jump, roll, attack, and use items to overcome immediate obstacles
Facing fierce enemies, challenging difficult dangers, only to fulfill the mission!

· Foreshadowed backstory
Why do the two masters and apprentices live here all year round? Why do the dark barbarians invade at this time? As the watchman, can you convey the news in time
A magical journey began.
